channel.title: 6th Kyu on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in 6th Kyu on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Green belt / 6th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kick/Punch (Kette junzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Kette gyakuzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 3: Tobikomizuki from shizentai Basic 4: Sokuto Chudan Basic 5: Mawashi geri nikai Basic 6: Nidan geri Pairs Pair 1: Overview (Mawashi geri/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Kizamizuki) Pair 1: Defence (Body shield/Chop block) Pair 2: Attack (I forgot to defend my head on the stunning elbow strike) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mawashi geri/Ushiro geri/uraken
